question.text: The rays of the sun are focused on a piece of ice through a lens of diameter <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo> </mo><mi>cm</mi></math>, as a result of which <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math> ice melts in <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>10</mn></math> minutes. The amount of heat received from the sun per unit area per minute is

options.text: <math><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

<math><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

<math><mn>400</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>

solution.text:
Mass of ice melted/ min =1010=1 g

Quantity of heat used = 1×80 cal

Area of lens = πr2=3.142.52=19.625 cm2

∴  Amount of heat received per minute per cm2 from sun

= 8019.625=4 cal cm-2 min-1
